mapper.sql: u.id, u.name, u.org_id, u.psd, u.is_used, u.create_time, u.salt
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (id, name, org_id, psd, is_used, create_time, salt) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{psd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUsed,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_user
id,
name,
org_id,
psd,
is_used,
create_time,
salt,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update t_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
psd = #{psd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=BIT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, psd = #{psd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_used = #{isUsed,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
